snippet: Janet Napolitano, the president of the University of California, discusses a rise in in-state admissions....
abstract: Letter from University of California president Janet Napolitano comments on July 8 article discussing how states have reduced spending on public higher education.
lead_paragraph: Janet Napolitano, the president of the University of California, discusses a rise in in-state admissions.

headline.main: The University of California’s Student Body
